page.title: 01General Impression
page.content: Our square covers part of the following districts. Willenhall,Bentley,Darlaston, all in the borough of Walsall. The area has many industrial outlets, many still associated with metal industries. Features of the local landscape would include large new housing estatea, areas of Victorian housing.Sites of industrial dereliction,some of which are now being landscaped by the local council. The M6 motorway runs through the square, this is always a source of traffic congestion,noise, and pollution. Schools contributing to the information on this square are Alum well, Pinfold Street,Noose Lane,King Charles,Rough Hay,St. Giles.These are all Junior Schools. Jane Lane Special School also helped with the project.
